summary: Hospital/clinic website project deployed on Internet Computer (icp0.io) with requests to adjust page content/design (e.g., doctor suites).
architectural_notes: Site is deployed to the Internet Computer and accessible via an icp0.io canister URL (https://<canister-id>.icp0.io).
known_issues: Users may see 'Error 400: Canister ID Not Resolved' if they open an incorrect/missing canister URL.
Draft deployments can expire and require rebuilding/redeploying.

existing_features.title: Implement a dedicated "Doctor Suites" page (using the existing `frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx`) with polished, hospital-quality layout and English user-facing text. The page must clearly present doctor suites information in a structured way (e.g., suite/department name, brief description, hours/availability, and a clear call-to-action to book an appointment or contact the clinic).
Add routing and navigation for the "Doctor Suites" page so users can reach it from the main header navigation.
Update SEO metadata and sitemap to include the Doctor Suites route.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update/modify the 'Doctor Suites' section/content on the website
